member.name: WS_DNS_ENDPOINT_IDENTITY
member.summary: Type for specifying an endpoint identity represented by a DNS name.

member.name: WS_DNS_ENDPOINT_IDENTITY.identity
member.summary: The base type from which this type and all other endpoint identity types derive.

member.name: WS_DNS_ENDPOINT_IDENTITY.dns
member.summary: The DNS name of the endpoint that is represented by this endpoint identity. The acceptable forms of the name are as defined by RFC 1035. In particular, they include both a simple machine name as well as a fully qualified domain name (FQDN).
